questions.text: What is the first step in a 'Stage gate' process?
Which is not an example of an external factor for learning and knowledge?
Which is not an implementation activity for an information system?
Strategic decision making can take place at various levels of an organisation, what are the three most common?
questions.choiceD: D: Board of Directors, Chief Executive, and Junior Management

questions.text: How might the size of a business be best measured?
questions.choiceA: A: Number of employees, and overall gross profit
questions.choiceB: B: Number of outlets or business units and market value
questions.choiceC: C: Total revenue and capital investment

questions.text: PESTLE is an acronym for what?
questions.choiceA: A: Political, environmental, technological, legal, and environmental
questions.choiceB: B: Political, environmental, shareholding, technological, logistical, and e-marketing
questions.choiceC: C: Political, environmental, social, technological, legal, and environmental
questions.choiceD: D: Political, environmental, societal, technological, learning, and e-marketing

questions.text: The business model canvas describes an organisation’s or a product’s what?
questions.choiceA: A: Value proposition, infrastructure, customers, and finances
questions.choiceC: C: Value proposition, infrastructure, and markets
